PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_HeatExchangerTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Heat exchanger type common attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: Arrangement
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the basic flow arrangements for the heat exchanger: COUNTERFLOW: Counterflow heat exchanger arrangement. CROSSFLOW: Crossflow heat exchanger arrangement. PARALLELFLOW: Parallel flow heat exchanger arrangement. MULTIPASS: Multipass flow heat exchanger arrangement. OTHER: Other type of heat exchanger flow arrangement not defined above.

PropertyDef.Name: ShellMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: Material used to construct the shell of the heat exchanger.
